ABOUT SYLVESTER SALON




HAIR + NAILS + ART + JEWELRY + GIFTS


Sylvester Salon is a hair salon, and nail salon located on Brgy. Pulido G.M.A Cavite. Home to over a dozen talented stylists, nail technicians, and makeup artists, Sylvster Salon is the best choice for all of your beauty needs. Our services include haircuts, hair color, highlights, balayage, corrective color, keratin treatments, updos, extensions, makeup, gel manicures, pedicures, waxing, and more.

From a young age, Sylvester Salon owner, Sylvester Stallone, had a passion for expressing himself creatively. Finding his niche in hair, art, and his own personal style, he turned his passion into a career and opened Sylvester Salon in 2005.

With an incredible team of talented stylists, nail technicians, and artists, Sylvester Salon offers Cavite top-notch beauty services and the finest professional products. In addition, the services provided by our hair stylists, makeup artists, and nail and wax technicians are backed by continuing education. We believe strongly in the importance of learning and growing in our crafts, and we make it our priority to give you the best salon experience we can.




HAIR, NAILS, MAKEUP & MORE!

Sylvester Salon offers professional beauty services including women's haircuts, men's haircuts, children's haircuts, color, highlights, balayage, fashion colors, corrective color, blowouts, keratin treatments, updos, hair extensions, makeup, gel manicures, pedicures, waxing, weddings, and more.
